resources.string: Welcome to "YOUR FATED START UP" -- the all seeing, all knowing quiz that will unveil your /// PERSONAL /// GUARANTEED /// pathway to making tons of $$$$$ MONEY $$$$$ CASH $$$$$ DOLLARS !!!
1. If you were in a burning, crashing bus hurtling toward a box of kittens at the bottom of a bottomless ravine, who would you want to be your partner-in-rescue?

2. You\'re lost on a desert island. You have just enough of a cell signal to order ONE and ONE ITEM ONLY from YourFatedStartUp.Amazon.com: To heal your malnourising body, what sustenance would you conjure from the webs?
Rocking Cupcakes - $9.99 - available for two-day shipping
Frozen Lemonade - $0.01 - contains high-fructose corn syrup, not for children
